content: Just now i booked a cab , it showing 873 and the guy is asking give me 1300 else cancel, what sort of behaviour is this when i asked him to cancel the ride from hi side since he is refusing , he s threatening me . Ola .. are you hiring driveror gunda

After calling the driver he didn't pick the phone nearly for ten minutes, when he did he told me he is on the way which was apparently not. By hiring such nonsense people you are putting lives in danger. Putting details of the ride,which I had to cancel.
KLK Oleomas is HIRING Various position Apply now:

#Jobs #OLA is HIRING.If you are the one or know someone who is perfect for this one,share with them.When the world is right now firing people,we will post more & more jobs & make it easier for you to be an inch closer to your work dreams. Linktree-

We are #hiring for for a Level 1 #SupportSpecialist to join our Core Team! Youll be working to triage support tickets and working with our incredible open source community, Sounds perfect for you? Well then our Alpaca Crew is eager to meet you-

Many changes coming soon on the app over next few weeks. App design needs some love Already, most people are now on our own maps instead of google maps. Also, incremental changes like the bottom Nav bar etc. Much deeper UX enhancers coming over next few weeks

content: #Human #Resources Officer Job #Vacancy at ALAF

These are really very badtameez, I happened to hire an Ola cab from Bengaluru Airport to Art of Living Ashram, initially I was to ask to pay 951/= from the Airport to the ashram , on reaching the destination he charged me 1300/= now l will think twice for hiring Ola.

ended trip and 707 rupees debited for my wallet.. Then he took my phone and took photo and went silently.. What kind of fraudulent drivers you are hiring.. Very scary to take ola services. Even no option there in app to contact support team.. Hellish
they are hiring anyone and everyone just for the sake of it.. the Ola Riders are the real harrasment for the public..

So on average ola charges 30 RS per km at peak which is already highest and double of market rates of 15 RS per km for hiring a cab through vendors. 25% more means 37-40 pkm, at 30 RS I get the worst services of why will I pay so high. Jo hai woh to sahi se de

Unlike I wish the Indian govt. come up with An app to book a cab / auto to solve one of the biggest problems "hiring an Auto/cab" . Existing app based cab operators cannot provide the proper service. As a commuter we have to face issues

Please do sumthing about the low quality of and the abnormal high rates! Rather than bragging abt hiring from IITs. ...If your company wishes to survive - coz the next better start-up in your field may soon take over the cab hiring domain.
We stopped hiring now days because of issues of driver and never be on time, instead we go with Kali peeli taxi or Auto.

Ola discriminates against men in hiring policies Most of the customer care executives would be busy doing make up and then go on for Chai & soota to seek attention. I stopped using ola since a long time #BoycottOla
Why are you hiring Riders who are very rude and behaving like rowdies to customers ! I will sue your company for hiring Riders without checking their background Very Bad
The issue is you are hiring unloyal drivers who is sitting their to take extra money And customer care is unreachable

travelling in Ola or Uber cabs is like travelling in garbage trucks. These are so pathetically dirty, you have no idea. Cant you have some check mechanism introduced into your system? Missing old system of hiring cabs.
We've partnered with Cricket Academy of Pathans to identify talent & offer scholarships to our Driver Partners children. #OPLRunsKitneHai

content: first fix the issues with your existing EV Vehicles after you can launch new EVs . Shame on your company you people are looting Indians hard earned money.

Layoffs are happening across the group-- ANI and electric.

Anxious employees, uncertainty fears, three days and multiple media reports later, Ola decides to make a U-turn in Thursday's townhall and calls off its plans to lay off its employees currently. #ola #olaelectric #media #news #ev
Officially layed off today because of COVID-19.

content: Apparently Ola electric has an attrition of 47%. Exploitative Coal mines in 18th century england had less attrition than that. Which makes me wonder How bad their culture is, that their entire employee base changes every 2 years. I think this is the closest we will get to Ship

content: I saw another article on silent layoff in tech. I guess these kind of statements is the start.

Global companies are undergoing a corporate bloodbath, and Indian companies, unfortunately, arent completely immune to it. Edtech giant , in its latest #layoff, asked 2,500 employees to leave. Other companies like , , are also in que.

Ride-hailing major #Ola started to #layoff 200 employees from its Ola Cabs, Ola Electric and Ola Financial Services verticals as part of the "restructuring" exercise. The #layoffs, which were first announced in September last year, happened across the teams.
. fires 250 more after last round of 700 #layoff #resign #ola Read more at

content: Book ho gai cab, aur koi aa nahi raha, driver change hote rahe. Uske bad kabhi use kiya nahi. Delhi me abhi blue smart ki service achhi hai. Bombay me shayad launch nahi hui abhi tak.
Ola cabs launch at Ayodhya will further elevate the tourism experience.
Vocs pediram eu lancei. Amanh s 18h

So, launch an inefficient service, make money, move to another business, let people cry, then make a normal service as premium and make more money! Full benefit of poor consumer laws in India.

content: #OlaElectric has decided to fast-track the launch of its Gen3 platform-based electric scooters to January 2025.
#OlaElectric had earlier planned to launch 3,200 new showrooms across India on December 20.
The future of mobility is here. 4000 stores and the launch of the S1 Pro Sona prove that electric is the way forward.

Next up is the market drop of in upcoming days. People will be selling based on mass sentiments. Although they have already faced enough lash backs on the books they submitted before IPO launch. Not enough Capex for 24 months etc, will also be highlighted.

Newly-listed forays into the electric motorcycle segment. The firm's bike portfolio under this range comprises of 3 models with prices starting from 75,000. caught up with to know about company's revenue outlook, motorcycle launch & more!
Can they also launch electric refunds ?
EVs reimagined! and launch 4000 stores and the spectacular golden S1 Pro.
#IPOCorner | Newsbreak confirmed, SEBI Clears IPO
Were racing to #EndICEage like never before. And theres no stopping us. Ending 2024 with a whole new range of EVs. You ready for it? Reservations open, deliveries Apr25! Ola S1 Z: Ola Gig:

content: Ola Electric is going to be first EV maker to come up with an IPO raising 5,500cr . While EV is making its way, someone has launched a targeted social media campaign just an hour back where 100s of fake accounts have started a hashtag trend using a particular image.

content: My first AUTO writeup! Ever since childhood, I have wanted to write on automobiles. Never got the opportunity until now, thanks to EVs. EVs allow for a beautiful merger of tech & auto. My review of the Move OS 2. #ola

Ola Electric has filed for IPO today! Ola enjoyed a market share of 35% in the E2W segment this year. In terms of total sales, Nov'23 marked the highest EV sales ever ~1.5 lakh units. Let's take a closer look at the EV industry in India.
